title: 251: Haunted House Update + Khloe’s Pic + Demi Lovato & Froyogate + Matt News + Meeting Lisa Vanderpump
itunes:title: 251: Haunted House Update + Khloe’s Pic + Demi Lovato & Froyogate + Matt News + Meeting Lisa Vanderpump
description:
(Content Warning: disordered eating & body dysmorphia) Today’s episode is a wild ride with The Broads! Jess gives updates on her haunted house, they discuss Khloe Kardashian’s recent removal of an unedited photo, Demi Lovato calling out a froyo shop, Matt confirming pursuing a relationship with Rachael, theories about Katie’s Bachelorette season, Bennett’s recent shenanigans, The Broads experience meeting and recording with Lisa Vanderpump, and Bekah’s thoughts on potentially pursuing Real Housewives!

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:***MEJURI: Go to MEJURI.COM/CHATTY for 10% off your first order!***JENNIY KAYNE: Go to JENNIKAYNE.COM and use code CHATTY at checkout to get 15% off your first order!***JUNE SHINE: Receive 20% off PLUS free shipping site wide at JUNESHINE.COM/CHATTY or use code CHATTY***UPSTART: Find out how Upstart can lower your monthly payments today when you go to UPSTART.COM/CHATTY

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
